sentences.en: Explanatory Undo is, generally , a much more pleasant feature than blind Undo.
sentences.cn: 解释性撤销与隐蔽撤销相比,使用起来更愉悦.

sentences.en: See explanatory notes at the foot of this page.
The concept was later seen to have explanatory power.
sentences.cn: 这一概念其后被认为具有阐释力。

sentences.en: The document has two explanatory notes attached to it.
sentences.cn: 文件后面附加两项说明.

sentences.en: The editor is giving explanatory notes to the translation.
The official prefixed an explanatory note to the list of statistics.
sentences.cn: 那官员在统计表前加了一段说明文字.

sentences.en: The remaining sections under the various comment statements should be self - explanatory.
sentences.cn: 不同注释语句下面的其余部分应自行说明.

sentences.en: The revenues from public services are self - explanatory and raise few conceptual problems.
sentences.cn: 公共服务事业提供收入是理所当然的,不会引起概念上的问题.

sentences.en: The subject may merit a brief explanatory note.
sentences.cn: 这题目也许要个简明的注释.

sentences.en: There are explanatory notes at the back of the book.
There are explanatory notes at the end of each chapter.
There are some explanatory notes at the end of the chapter.
sentences.cn: 这一章的结尾有一些注解.

sentences.en: These statements are accompanied by a series of explanatory notes.
sentences.cn: 这些陈述后面有一系列解释性注释。

sentences.en: This , with an angry explanatory wave of her right arm.
sentences.cn: 说时她怒气冲冲打着手势.

sentences.en: This explanatory note seems to be closer to what is ment by the author.
sentences.cn: 这样注解比较切近作者原意.

sentences.en: To be quite fair, the phrase is by no means self - explanatory.
sentences.cn: 公允地讲, 这个短语并非是不加解释一看就可以明了的.

words.tran_cn: 待解释的词；待解释事物
解释要素；解释前提；词的意义

phrases.tran_cn: 说明文本，说明注记；图注

trans.tran_en: giving information about something or describing how something works, in order to make it easier to understand
